com.unionpay.cloudpos
Interface DeviceManagerProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
DeviceManagerImpl
public interface DeviceManagerProvider

DeviceManagerProvider是设备管理器的实现提供者接口。 设备管理器DeviceManager通过调用本接口的实现者来获得具体的设备Control。

Version:
July 1, 2013
Author:
Haiqing.Jin

Method Summary
 ContactlessCardControl getContactlessCardControl()
          获得非接卡设备Control
 HSMControl getHSMControl()
          获得硬件安全模块设备Control
 LEDControl getLEDControl()
          获得LED设备Control
 MSRControl getMSRControl()
          获得磁条卡读卡器的设备Control
 PINPadControl getPINPadControl()
          获得密码键盘设备Control
 PrinterControl getPrinterControl()
          获得打印设备Control
 SCSControl getSmartCardControl()
          获得IC卡读卡器设备Control
